summary: This country music jamboree is noteworthy for being the last time that Leo Gorcey and Huntz Hall appeared in a movie together.
cast: Arnold Stang|Pamela Hayes|Leo Gorcey|Huntz Hall|Carl Butler|Pearl Butler|Old Joe Clark|Little Jimmy Dickens|Pete Drake|Curly Fox|Lefty Frizzell|Marilyn Gallo|George Hamilton IV|Homer|Sonny James|Jethro|Merle Kilgore|Dave Lewis|Bill Monroe|Lamar Morris|Minnie Pearl|Bob Perry|Bill Phillips|Webb Pierce|Del Reeves|Murv Shiner|Delores Smiley|Clyde Smith|Connie Smith|Buddy Spicher|Billy Walker|Kitty Wells|Dottie West|Johnny Wright|Faron Young
title: Second Fiddle to a Steel Guitar
